programme.title: AWD Safari Challenge
programme.desc: Watch the exciting Safari Championship organized by the British All Wheel Drive Club, in which modified 4x4 vehicles of all brands can participate.

programme.title: Hi-Tec Drift Allstars Series Australia
programme.desc: The latest drifting competition on Motorvision.TV brings you the best drifters from Australia. Join us for thrilling duels, smoking wheels and non-stop drift battles for the Drift All Stars Series title.

programme.title: San Antonio Race 2
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: Top Fuel Australia Championship
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: National Legend Cars
programme.desc: The Legends Cars National Championship brings back racing from yesteryear. The series features 5/8 scale replicas of pre-war 1930s Fords, Chevys and Dodges that are equipped with 125bhp-motorcycle engines. These cars are well known for delivering high-octane battles on race tracks around Great Britain.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (Motorbike Launch) S3 (n°29)
programme.desc: «Motorbike Launch»A new test by the stunt people of Action Concept. They have to show a spectacular flight with a motobike, which is crashing afterwards. But that would be too dangerous for a stuntman. Stunt coordinator Ramazan Bulut hast to be creative. The guys develop a cannon for the motorbike. Will it have enough pressure to shoot the bike? The result is very impressive. Even the hard headed stunt guys are surprised!

programme.title: Supercars S5
programme.desc: The Porsche Panamera Turbo S is the most dynamic sedan in the world. No other car finds the perfect balance between calm gliding on the one hand and extreme performance on the other hand. 570 hp, 3,8 seconds from zero to 100 km/h and a top speed of 310 km/h are impressive performance data for this big car. Plus: the Jaguar XJR with a 550 hp V8 engine and the Mercedes CLS 500.

programme.title: Classic Ride S3
programme.desc: In the early 70s it was the fastest and most sportive production sports car in Germany: The Porsche Carrera RS. Today the RS is a classic Porsche with the highest acclaim.

programme.title: Formula E - Specials
programme.desc: ABB FIA Formula E the Number 1s, a look back over all the races to find the most amazing moments in Formula E's history. We pick the Number 1 moment in ten categories looking at amazing action from overtakes, close shaves, starts, and incidents, through the best driver reactions, FanBoosts and Attack Modes, to innovations and insights, and finally we pick out the best race so far.

programme.title: Grand Prix of France, Nice
programme.desc: X-Trial is a young and dynamic sport. The events take place in arenas and the spectators are up close during the entire period. Spectacular setups with challenging obstacles combined with the skill of the best riders in the world promise great entertainment. Motorvision.TV shows highlights from all six events of the 2022 season.

programme.title: MXGP of Trentino, Pietramurata
programme.desc: Lap after lap of international motorsports action. This is coverage from the FIM (Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme) Motocross World Championship where riders from all over the globe compete in high-octane, fast-paced motocross racing. Competitors battle it out in races lasting 35 minutes plus 2 laps per race.

programme.title: Grand Prix of Poland, Gliwice
programme.desc: FIM SuperEnduro World Championship has been held since 2007. Its circuits are built inside stadiums or arenas, recreating obstacles such as rocks, boulders and logs. The championship consists of eight Grands Prix spread around the globe on courses that are mostly off-road. These events are split into two days and two different races, after which the points towards the world championship are awarded. Each round includes a motocross test and an extreme test, in addition to the enduro test.

programme.title: Australian Motocross Championship
programme.desc: The Australian ProMX Championship is the nation's premier motocross championship. The series acts as a successful development platform for young Australian talent and is designed as a tiered system with three dedicated classes: MX3 for younger drivers, the MX2 for senior drivers and the MX1, which is the elite category in the championship.

programme.title: Grand Prix of France, Bordeaux
programme.desc: FIM X-Trial World Championship is the most prestigious indoor motorcycle trials tournament of the world, organised by the Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme. The programme presents the highlights of the rounds where the participants have to take on the challenging tracks full of steep climbs and huge rocks.

programme.title: Victoria
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: British Truck Racing
programme.desc: The Brisith Truck Racing Championship features some of the heaviest racing machines you'll ever see. Each truck weighs more than five tonnes and produces in excess of 1000bhp. The 2022 season features a total of 7 events that are contested around the United Kingdom.

programme.title: DTM
programme.desc: The DTM - Deutsche Tourenwagen Masters - is the premier German touring car championship. In 2022, the competition is in its 23rd season and features 16 races across 8 weekends. Motorvision.TV shows the best bits from each event.

programme.title: Ferrari Challenge Europe
programme.desc: The Ferrari Challenge is a single-marque motorsport championship that was created in 1993 and is now the longest-running single-make series championship. The European series is a two-class championship and by far the largest series. It contains 7 races, held on challenging and most prestigious European circuits.

programme.title: Lausitzring, Germany
programme.desc: League of super sports cars.

programme.title: WeatherTech SportsCar Championship
programme.desc: The IMSA WeatherTech SportsCar Championhip is an endurance racing championship in North America where up to five different classes compete in eleven events.

programme.title: GT World Challenge Europe Brands Hatch
programme.desc: GT World Challenge Europe arrives at Brands Hatch, showcasing cars from the biggest manufacturers, the likes of Audi, Porsche, Ferrari, and more. View the latest action, updates, and stats from the event!

programme.title: GT World Challenge America
programme.desc: It's America's most challenging and scenic circuits. GT World Challenge America offers exclusive GT3 racing in an exciting way with the two-driver, 90-minute SprintX style format with full-service pit stops that provide great racing and high competition. Each event features two races per weekend in a friendly atmosphere. Many manufacturers including Acura, BMW, Bentley, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Mercedes-AMG, Nissan, and Porsche campaign entries in the category.

programme.title: Championnat d'Europe de courses de camions
programme.desc: The FIA European Truck Racing Championship is the biggest, most imposing racing series in the world. The racing trucks are equipped with 1200 hp engines doing up to 100 miles per hour. On a grid with 26 big rigs the 5.5-ton machines doing battle there's guaranteed action-packed lights-to-flag racing galore.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: When their ambitions exceed their driving skills, when well-secured racing professionals are thrown out of corners, we always have a camera at hand. Breathtaking stunts by professional drivers and slapstick-action in highly-tuned tin can rockets. Spectacular scenes where nobody gets hurt.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (Revenge) S3 (n°30)
programme.desc: «Revenge»The Stunt Heroes are testing for a big movie. They are filming a car crash and the idea is that it should look like if the main character of the movie, the actor is really driving the car. They are using filmtricks and a self constructed airbag to reach their goal. The documentary shows how the stunt people create that kind of stunt.

programme.title: Supercars S5
programme.desc: He is one of the most exciting sportscars in the world: the Ferrari 458 Speciale. A screaming racecar for the street, a car that puts your nervs on permanent fire. To drive this rolling thunder is unforgetable. Also in this show. The Mc Laren 650S, a car as fast as the Ferrari but quiet more on the technical than on the emotional side.

programme.title: Classic Ride S5
programme.desc: Classic Ride takes a trip around the world to visit some of the most fascinating vintage cars ever built. In Thailand a gull-winged Mercedes 190 SL and other souped-up classic cars take part in the Bangkok Classic Car Ride. Plus: An Oldsmobile convertible travels on Venezuela's most beautiful island, while oldies from the US like a 1952 Chevrolet Styleline become a tourist attraction in Cuba.

programme.title: Formula E - Specials
programme.desc: ABB FIA Formula E the Number 1s, a look back over all the races to find the most amazing moments in Formula E's history. We pick the Number 1 moment in ten categories looking at amazing action from overtakes, close shaves, starts, and incidents, through the best driver reactions, FanBoosts and Attack Modes, to innovations and insights, and finally we pick out the best race so far.

programme.title: Grand Prix of France, Chalon Sur Saone
programme.desc: X-Trial is a young and dynamic sport. The events take place in arenas and the spectators are up close during the entire period. Spectacular setups with challenging obstacles combined with the skill of the best riders in the world promise great entertainment. Motorvision.TV shows highlights from all six events of the 2022 season.

programme.title: Bike World
programme.desc: Bike World revolves around the speedway and the racers swishing by on their two wheelers. Find out the latest news and reports regarding two-wheel competitions in the world of speed. This is the content to enjoy for all motorcycle enthusiasts across the world. Explore the best motorbikes, top locations, and iconic racers who have a lot of fun doing it.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Exciting sports show that follows the hottest action from the world's most unique motor sport events. Viewers will have a chance to visit some interesting competitions- from IDEMITSU 600 Super Endurance at the Chang Interna-tional Circuit in Thailand, the winter edition of the Maroc Challenge in Morocco, to the Hispania Rally, the only European rally to take place in the desert, and many more. Viewers will also find out all the news from the world of motor sports.

programme.title: Perfect Ride S6
programme.desc: What's hot and what's not. There are quests to be undertaken, the search for the ideal auto, for the perfect race track for the ultimate accessory gadget. What are the preferred rides of the race legends?

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: A synergy of high-octane power, speed, luxury and prestige. Supercars features some of the most desirable automobiles in the world, whether it be an agile sports car to a comfortable limousine. It features the likes of prestige brands filled with rich heritage and motorsport pedigree; such as Bentley, BMW M, Mercedes AMG, Aston Martin, Maserati, Porsche and Ferrari to niche-market, lightweight Lotuses, KTMs and Caterhams. Supercars has everything a petrolhead needs to get up to speed on the latest and greatest of high-performance road machines.

programme.title: Go Green!
programme.desc: Energy saving is becoming a more and more important goal for the world's leading car manufacturers. Motorvision TV explores the environment-friendly solutions emerging in the car industry. presenting the latest ideas from research and development teams. Find out what are the best ways to go green when it comes to your vehicle.

programme.title: Spotted
programme.desc: When car spotters find rare cars it's like winning the lottery. One of the most exclusive cars in the world is the Paguani Huayra, which was built just 20 times. Its counterpart: the Rimac Concept One, which writes history as the world's fastest electric car with a top speed of 355 kmph. Lamborghini Huracan O.CT and Arden Jaguar F-Type promise brutal tuning power beyond good and evil.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: Patrick makes André sweat! Also on the show tourists from all over the world have made their way down to the Green Hell including many Germans, Austrians and 5 crazy Englishmen in a taxi!

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (The Matrix) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «The Matrix»Martial arts specialist Ramazan creates a choreography for a fight. It involves four stuntmen who need to disguise as secret agents and bash on him. Will Ramazan be able to free himself from this uncomfortable position and who will spectacularly take off with a car? Find out on this episode of Stunt Heroes.

programme.title: Supercars S2
programme.desc: It's showtime! The BMW ACS5 Sport S Limousine is on the track. Last year at the International Motor Show it's 'smoother' brother was introduced and after the 'beauty' now the 'beast' is released.

programme.title: Classic Ride S2
programme.desc: There is a crazy new thing from Volkswagen. A car that can dress up after you get it, to look anyway you want it. A car that can be anything, can do anything, is a car that only can be called The Thing by Volkswagen.

programme.title: Episode 14
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.
